meanings.definition: The quality of being relaxed and tolerant in attitude or manner.
meanings.sent1: Her easygoingnesses made everyone feel comfortable around her.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate his easygoingnesses when dealing with difficult situations.
meanings.sent3: The easygoingnesses of the cat was evident as it lazily stretched in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His easygoingnesses was like a gentle breeze on a hot summer day, calming everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The easygoingnesses of the beach town was infectious, making visitors feel instantly at ease.

meanings.definition: The state of being calm and unworried in nature.
meanings.sent1: The easygoingnesses of the park on a quiet morning was truly peaceful.
meanings.sent2: She exuded an easygoingnesses that was contagious to those around her.
meanings.sent3: The easygoingnesses of the sloth was so extreme that it barely moved at all.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the city, his easygoingnesses was a beacon of tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The easygoingnesses of the old oak tree in the backyard was a source of comfort for the family.
